description.value:
A Miniscule-Sized Hovering Sphere that comes with a 4kg case that contains a docking station and various holo-displays. The Sphere can scout up to 15km from its docking station, once it returns it produces a 3D holomap of the scouted area, downloadable to standard data-slates. Sphere has Flyer 8, 1 Wound, and No AP/T. Attempting to detect it by sight or hearing has -30.

Requirements

Rumoured Inqusititorial versions incorporate active camoflage and ultra quiet dampeners to scout room interiors and buildings unnoticed.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: 1500 T
